title: Don’t Need Biden’s Permission to Be Free | Guest: Bill O’Reilly | 3/12/21
description:
In his first prime-time presidential address, President Biden reveals what the government will "allow" us to do moving forward, as if this wasn’t a free country. Pat Gray joins to discuss Biden’s address and how the COVID rules have created two separate countries. The Pentagon and senior military officials called out Tucker Carlson for his comments on women and the military. Bill O’Reilly joins to discuss Biden’s presidential address, his COVID relief bill, and the politicization of our military. Texas Gov. Greg Abbott attacked social media app Gab. Glenn shares a hopeful story about his kids. Glenn and Stu talk great ways to order food in the mail and bicker about the temperature of the studio.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
